info.name: KissManga - Modern
info.description: What's new? - I've made links that were difficult to click bigger. - Added a background to the header. - Change the logo. - Made mostly everything a light black / dark grey and Blueish
info.additionalInfo: V1.0 (April 16th, 2018): ► "First" release. This was called KissManga - Material but I didn't think it fit that style so I renamed it KissManga - Modern and made it look like a website from our time.
